statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.8}+{8.94}\right)}={29.48}\approx{29.48}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.94}\cdot{5.48}={48.9912}\approx{49}.
